amendment.description: Amendment provided that inclusion in the National Landscape Conservation System does not additionally restrict or hinder energy development within the System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-573 to provide that in clusion in the National Landscape Conservation System does not additionally restrict or hinder energy development within the System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 333 - 89 (Roll no. 170).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 333 - 89 (Roll no. 170).
